posts.author: 中金在线香港特约
posts.title: 耀才证券植耀辉：美股再创新高 恒指方向未明续争持-
posts.text:
美股再创收市新高，道指及标普均微升，前者仅升9点至23,548点，标普则升3点至2,591点，连同上升0.33%之纳指，美国三大指数今年已是第26次同日创收市新高。科技股继续支持大市表现，亚马逊上升0.82%，苹果及Facebook亦分别上升1%及0.7%。
公司消息方面，英特尔与AMD宣布合作，为三十年来首次，主要是抗衡竞争对手英伟达。AMD股价大升7%，英特尔则升1.37%，英伟达则开市时微跌约1%，收市则倒升0.45%。另外，全球最大半导体�造商之一博通（Broadcom）以每股70 美元 现金加股票方式向高通（Qualcomm）提出敌意收购，交易总价值1,300亿美元。不过据报导指高通将拒绝收购提议，除了是认为收购价太低外，合�所面临的监管风险亦太大。
另外， 美联储 局第三号人物、纽约联储主席杜德利正式宣布将提前半年卸任，至此联储局三巨头均会离任，这是联储局80年来未曾出现的情况。有指是为新联储局主席有更多发挥空间，但可以肯定总统特朗普将安排更多其属意之人选进入联储局，令人质疑联储局日后能否维持独立性。
除此以外，引述媒体报导，参议员McCain表示希望税改能听取民主党人和共和党人双方意见，意味他可能会就税改投反对票。事实上，早前McCain已就废除奥巴马医改投出反对票，当时他同样表示希望在医改上听取两党意见。看来税改能否顺利通过在一定暗涌。
中概股 方面， 阿里 巴巴上升2.53%，再创收市新高，京东及百度亦分别上升1.54%及1.24%，网易则急升10.4%，趣店亦再升8.3%，收报27.10美元，为连续第五个交易日收于招股价24美元之上。上�五登场之和信贷则大跌13.27%，另外迅雷股价亦大跌25.09%。
回说 港股 ，港股昨日又再上演惊险一幕，甫开市即出现「闪跌」，其后跌幅更扩大至466点。市场随即传出多个消息，包括 周小川 文章提到要严防金融风险，沙特打贪行动导致出现拆仓等等。不过，昨日A股并无出现异样，外围市况亦未见有大幅波动，所以两大「解读」似乎并不站稳阵脚。还记得上月（19/10）港股亦曾在没有特别消息下出现大跌，惟并未跌穿28,000点支持，其后又再出现反弹，昨日港股亦出现相似情况。
由于过去数次 恒指 考验28,000点皆可守稳，故可以此水平作好淡分水岭，一日未失守该水平，投资者亦毋须过份担心。至于后市方面，相信港股仍未见有明确方向，暂仍于28,000-28,800点水平上落；除非A股能有好表现，否则短期恒指难有突破。
笔者持有亚马逊及腾讯（00700）股份

thread.title_full: İbrahim Erkal’ın ölümüyle ilgili karar verildi

posts.title: İbrahim Erkal’ın ölümüyle ilgili karar verildi
posts.text:
İbrahim Erkal’ın ölümüyle ilgili karar verildi Ünlü sanatçı İbrahim Erkal’ın ölümüyle ilgili soruşturmada savcılık takipsizlik kararı verdi. GİRİŞ 07.11.2017 10:51 İbrahim Erkal’ın ölümüyle ilgili karar verildi 
Maltepe Başıbüyük'teki evinin otoparkında 12 Nisan 2017 tarihinde baygın bulunarak hastaneye kaldırılan, 11 Mayıs 2017 tarihinde de yaşamını yitiren sanatçı İbrahim Erkal'a ilişkin olarak yürütülen soruşturma takipsizlikle sonuçlandı. 
İstanbul Anadolu Cumhuriyet Başsavcılığı tarafından yürütülen soruşturma sonucu verilen takipsizlik kararında, soruşturma dosyasına gelen 20 Eylül 2017 tarihli Adli Tıp Kurumu raporuna atıf yapıldı. Takipsizlik kararında, "Adli Tıp Kurumu'nun raporunda kişinin ölümünün künt kafa travmasına bağlı kafatası kırığı ile birlikte beyin kanaması ve gelişen komplikasyonları sonucu meydana gelmiş olduğu" belirtildi. TAKİPSİZLİK KARARI VERİLDİ 
Takipsizlik kararında şu ifadelere yer verildi: 
"Kişinin ölümüne neden olan travmatik değişimlerin lokalizasyonları, özellikleri ve ağırlıkları dikkate alındığında; kişinin yaralı olarak bulunduğu ortamda kendiliğinden kontrolsüz bir şekilde düşerek kafasını sert ve künt bir zemine çarpmasıyla husullerinin mümkün olduğunun tespit edildi. İbrahim Erkal'ın geçirdiği beyin kanaması sırasında, yere kontrolsüz şekilde düşerek düz zemine kafasını çarpması sonucu künt kafa travmasına bağlı kafatası kırığı ile birlikte beyin kanaması sonucu gelişen komplikasyonlar sonucu vefat ettiğinin anlaşıldığı, İbrahim Erkal'ın düştükten sonra 1 saat sonra bulunduğu, tıbbi müdahalenin de bu aşamadan sonra yapıldığı, soruşturma sonrasında olayla ilgili tüm tanıkların beyanlarının alındığı, yapılan soruşturma sonucunda İbrahim Erkal'ın ölümünde kasıt, kusuru veya ihmali bulunan şahıs tespit edilemediğinden, herhangi bir şüpheli hakkında yüklenen suçtan kamu adına kovuşturmaya yer olmadığına." KAYNAK DHA

posts.author: Alexey Fomichev
posts.title: ПОКЛОНСКАЯ МОЖЕТ ПЛОХО КОНЧИТЬ. И МЫ ТОЖЕ: РОЛЬ ЦА
posts.text:
ПОКЛОНСКАЯ МОЖЕТ ПЛОХО КОНЧИТЬ. И МЫ ТОЖЕ: РОЛЬ ЦАРЕБОЖНИКОВ В ДЕЛЕ ПРОИГРЫША «МАТИЛЬДЕ»
Итак, мерзкий, клеветнический фильм «Матильда» вышел на экран. Для этого есть причины: теплохладность народа, отсутствие во власти весомого количества людей, активно отстаивающих интересы православного населения страны.
Однако я глубоко убеждена, что одной из основных причин, по которой мы проиграли борьбу против вульгарного и кощунственного фильма, искажающего историческую правду, заключается в том, что в процессе этой самой борьбы против «Матильды» на авансцену общественной и церковной жизни поднялись люди, зараженные ересью царебожия, продвигаемой некогда раскольничьим лжеепископом Корнилием.
Люди, зараженные этими маргинальными идеями, стали появляться после распада СССР в тот момент, когда в Русской Православной Церкви обсуждался вопрос о канонизации царской семьи.
Они горячо выступали за прославление в лике святых последней царской семьи, что правильно, но, слишком увлекшись почитанием, они начали наделять личность святого мученика царя Николая II какими-то особыми и исключительными качествами, которых нет у остальных святых. Так усердствовали в почитании святого царя, что «немного» перестарались.
Впрочем, «немного», в нашем случае, – это уже много, ибо постановлено VII Вселенским Собором: «Прибавляющих что-либо к учению кафолической (т.е. Вселенской) Церкви или убавляющих от него мы предаем анафеме».
Поэтому проблема царебожия в России существует довольно давно. И мне очень жаль, что до сих пор в Русской Православной Церкви ни на каком из Соборов эти взгляды, уводящие многих людей от истины в погибель, не были осуждены.
На данный момент у царебожников есть организации, которые педалируют их искаженные взгляды в общественном пространстве. Наиболее яркими представителями группы людей, зараженных царебожническими идеями, мне видятся, Сергей Алиев, режиссер фильма «Ложь Матильды», Сергей Зотов, руководитель общества «Царское наследие», и особенно – пассионарный Александр Порожняков, руководитель движения «Царский Крест», на базе которого было собрало 100 000 подписей против кощунственного фильма «Матильда».
Вы только вдумайтесь, используя православных христиан, в числе которых есть и я, движение, зараженное царебожием, собрало 100 000 подписей и это широко освещается вплоть до федеральных СМИ. И практически никто, за исключением немногих неравнодушных православных, вроде активно занимающегося православным просвещением Александра Люльки , миссионера о. Георгия Максимова , замечательного батюшки-пролайфера Андрея Барабаша и других, это не опровергает.
Когда я ставила подпись под этим обращением, я понятия не имела о проблемах с царебожием в «Царском Кресте», как и многие из моих друзей и знакомых. Поэтому я считаю себя обманутой. И не только я.
С одной стороны мы видим глумление над святым царем в фильме, который выставляет его блудником и порочным человеком. История Церкви знает многих святых, которые были одержимы блудной страстью, а потом ее победили с помощью Божией. Никто этого не скрывает. Если бы с Николаем II была такая же история, то это было бы лишь поводом сказать, что после такой разгульной жизни человек образумился и создал очень крепкую семью, которая умерла в один день. Это был бы пример всем нам.
Вот это действительно история любви, достойная освещения кинематографом: у царя Николая и царицы Александры была настолько сильная любовь, что они умерли в один день мучительнейшей смертью, оставшиеся верными своей семье и своей любви. Но вместо этого в год столетия страшнейшей трагедии в истории русского народа нам предлагают сосредоточиться на клеветнических сплетнях и слухах, порочащих честь первого лица нашей страны. Бессовестность и цинизм этих людей, которые всячески изгаляются за народные деньги, просто потрясает!
С другой стороны, мы видим царебожников, которые приписывают царю Николаю другие качества, которых у него не было: мол, он искупил грех или грехи народа, или искупил грех клятвы 1613 и т.д. Но православные христиане знают, что Искупитель у нас Один – Господь Иисус Христос, который искупил нас на Кресте Своей Кровью из под власти абсолютно всех грехов.
И это тоже издевательство над святым царем и его памятью. Только это уже другая крайность.
Получается, что «Царский Крест» и другие подмяли деятельность по противодействию кощунственному фильму «Матильда» под себя и стали ассоциироваться в информационном пространстве с православными активистами.
Как православный активист с многолетним опытом, за свою позицию против богохульства год подвергающийся уголовному преследованию, для меня немыслимо слышать, что людей, зараженных ересью царебожия, СМИ выдают за нормальных православных христиан.
Мало того, «Царский Крест» проник к моему любимому белому генералу Леониду Петровичу Решетникову, труды которого на ниве просвещения в сфере проблем сталинизма вызывают мое искреннее восхищение. Также крайне неприятно видеть связь уважаемого мною депутата Государственной Думы Натальи Владимировны Поклонской с «Царским Крестом» – репост ею из группы, зараженной царебожием и прочее.
Хочется напомнить Наталье Владимировне, что на ту должность, на которой она сейчас находится, ее поставил Господь Бог, и если она не будет служить Ему правдой в чистоте вере, то запросто может её лишиться.
Я надеюсь, православные христиане в окружении Натальи Владимировны доведут до ее сведения информацию о наличии у царебожников догматических заблуждений и то, что от них нужно держаться подальше.
Если мы полагаемся на помощь людей, а не на помощь Бога, то Господь нас не поддержит, собери мы хоть 100 000 подписей, хоть 1 000 000, хоть 10 000 000 подписей. Для Бога имеет значение чистота веры, которую мы должны всячески оберегать, если хотим, чтоб Бог был на нашей стороне.
Фильм уйдет, а ересь царебожия останется, значительно усилившись. Ведь именно этот фильм высветил то, что в Церкви до сих пор есть эта проблема, которая не решена. Я думаю, что если бы вероучительные заблуждения царебожников были осуждены Церковью еще в 90-х годах XX века, никакого фильма «Матильда» не было бы. Господь специально посылает нам неприятности, чтоб мы посмотрели на себя и вокруг себя, насколько чиста наша вера и насколько наша жизнь соответствует этой вере.
P.S. Господин Холмогоров , если царебожия нет, то кто же строит храм «Царю Искупителю», пишет тропарь «Царю Искупителю», поклоняется иконам «Царю Искупителю»?
Друзья, будьте бдительны! Андрей Дамер , Вячеслав Перков , Павел Тимонин , Ирина Васина , Иван Хрисанов , Максим Воробьев , Антон Дулевич , Александр Антонюк , Сандро Пантелеев , Пан Прухницкий , Глеб Лихоткин , Петр Иванов , Алек Ситало , Ксения Елсукова , Иван Отраковский , Пётр Гоголин , Константин Тимофеев , Константин Гордица , Николай Андреев , Таня Зеленкова , Ефрем Калинин , Дмитрий Адоньев , Игорь Капранов , Павел Островский , Илья Пилюгин , Радоко Љубичић , Андрей Долгополов , Кирилл Фролов , Владимир Рогозин , Дмитрий Василенков , Гриша Марков , Иван Суслин , Валентин Марчук , Артемий Сильвестров , Роман Вершилло , Александр Киселёв , Роман Постников , Dmitry Zhitkov , Александр Ковальчук , Кристина Юдина , Игорь Лысенко , Владимир Лавров , Олег Костромской , Георгий Таманец , Александр Михайлович , Jesse Dominick , Валерия Левитова , Иерей-Георгий Рощупкин , Вера Осташева , Евгений Чесноков , Андрей Швед , Владимир Потиха

posts.title: Organ Bağışı Bilgilendirme Toplantısı yapıldı
posts.text: Bu haber 07 Kasım 2017, Salı 09:25 tarihinde eklendi. 102 kez okundu. Organ Bağışı Bilgilendirme Toplantısı yapıldı Lüleburgaz Sağlık Müdürlüğü, Toplum Sağlığı Merkezi ve Türkiye Petrolleri Anonim Ortaklığı(TPAO) ortaklığında 3-9 Kasım Organ Bağış Haftası nedeniyle TPAO çalışanlarına bilgilendirme toplantısı yapıldı. TPAO Toplantı Salonunda 6 Kasım Pazartesi günü saat 10.30’da gerçekleştirilen bilgilendirme toplantısında Dr. Harun Eker, katılımcılara organ bağışının önemini anlattı. Dr. Eker, Türkiye’de organ bağışının %80 oranında bağışçıların sağlıklı olduğu dönemde yapıldığını ve kadavradan organ bağışının arttırılması amacıyla bu toplantıyı yaptıklarını belirtti. 2015 yılında 7 bin 704 kişinin organ ve doku naklinin başarılı olduğunu belirten Dr. Eker “18 yaşından büyük ve akli dengesi yerinde olan herkes organlarının tamamını veya bir bölümünü bağışlayabilir. Tüm dünyada olduğu gibi ülkemizde de yeterli sayıda organ yoktur. Ülkemizde yaklaşık 30 bin kişi organ nakli bekliyor. Organ nakillerinin içinde en büyük payı ise böbrek nakli alıyor. En büyük organ kaynağı uygun koşullarda hayatını kaybetmiş kişilerin organlarıdır. Bu durumdaki kişilerin vücut fonksiyonları tamamen tıbbi destekle devam etmektedir ve bu durumu uzun sürede dengede tutmak imkânsızdır. Dolayısıyla kadavradan organ nakli alınabilmesi için zaman çok önemli bir faktördür. Diğer yandan hiç beklenmedik bir anda yakınını kaybettiğini öğrenen bir kişinin organ bağışı için karar vermesini beklemek çok zordur. Yakınlar, ancak hayattayken organlarını bağışladığını belirten yakınları için hızlı karar verebilmektedir. Kişinin organlarının alınabilmesi için mutlaka ailesinin de onayının alınması gerekir. Kişinin bağış kartı olsa dahi yakınlarından habersiz organları alınamaz. Kadavradan organ çıkarma işlemi herhangi bir canlı ameliyat kadar özenle yapılır. Organlar çıkarıldıktan sonra mümkün olduğunca estetik dikişlerle dikilerek, bedenin hiçbir şekilde zarar görmemesine büyük özen gösterilir. İl Sağlık Müdürlüğünde, Hastanelerde, Emniyet Müdürlüğünde ehliyet alımı sırasında, organ nakli yapan merkezlerde, organ nakli ile ilgilenen vakıf, dernek vb. kuruluşlarda organ bağışı yapılabilir.”dedi. TPAO İş Güvenliği ve Çevre Koruma Başmühendisi Ebru Minsolmaz, ülkemizde 30 bin kişinin organ nakli beklediğini, organ naklinin kutsal bir görev olduğunu belirterek kendisinin de organlarını bağışlayacağını söyledi. Minsolmaz, tüm halkımızın organ bağışına destek olması gerektiğini sözlerine ekledi. Toplantının ardından İlçe Sağlık Müdürlüğü ekipleri kurduğu stantta organ bağışının önemi hakkında bilgilendirmelerde bulunarak organ bağışı yapmak isteyenleri kayıt altına aldı.

thread.title: Lleral: "No está cerrada la causa por la muerte de Santiago Maldonado"
thread.title_full: Lleral: "No está cerrada la causa por la muerte de Santiago Maldonado"

posts.author: Roberto Durán (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Lleral: "No está cerrada la causa por la muerte de Santiago Maldonado"
posts.text:
El juez federal de Rawson, Gustavo Lleral, aseguró este lunes que "no está cerrada la causa de la muerte" de Santiago Maldonadoy confirmó que emprendieron la búsqueda del denominado "testigo E". "Es algo pendiente de conclusión con los exámenes complementarios de la autopsia. Eso va a llevar su tiempo, hay que ser pacientes. Los hechos necesitan verificarse de una manera de reconstrucción histórica en un proceso penal", sostuvo el magistrado.

Confirmó que busca identificar al denominado "testigo E", para que preste declaración en la causa por la muerte del joven artesano. Se trata de un testigo que en un informe ante la Comisión Interamericana de Derechos Humanos (CIDH) dijo haber sido la última persona que estuvo junto a Santiago al momento de adentrarse en el río Chubut, cuando eran perseguidos por efectivos de Gendarmería el pasado 1º de agosto.

thread.title: ARC Review by Jude: Finding Home by Garrett Leigh – From Top to Bottom Reviews
thread.title_full: ARC Review by Jude: Finding Home by Garrett Leigh – From Top to Bottom Reviews

posts.author: Jude Sierra
posts.title: ARC Review by Jude: Finding Home by Garrett Leigh – From Top to Bottom Reviews
posts.text:
*I was provided a copy of this via Netgalley 
4.5 stars This book caught me by surprise. I love Leigh’s work, so the fact that I loved this one isn’t really that shocking. Somehow, this book wasn’t on my radar until I was perusing Netgalley a while ago. I went into it knowing nothing of it and was instantly hooked. This book was a quick read — not because it lacked depth or emotion — but because the story grabbed me and because it was well written. Leigh frames the story skillfully — the prose never detracted from the story. Both Leo and Charlie are going through such difficult things, and I never felt as though it was over-dramatized, over-wrought or exploited. Here stems my biggest kudos to this book: books about foster care kids, troubled kids, kids who have been abused or neglected — they are often turned into tropes, or are cheapened, their stories designed as a quick thrill. Basically, these stories often end up as tragedy porn. Leigh did NONE of that. Readers are gifted a view into not just Leo and Charlie’s hearts, but the characters surrounding them. Charlie’s parents were so well grounded and fleshed out, as were his siblings. Leigh worked several threads throughout, with delayed reveal of some story aspects. In some cases, it worked very well. For example, learning that Charlie didn’t speak as a child — Leigh introduces us to this in a moment where it’s really important for Leo to understand and see. At this point in the story, Leo is actively working to other himself, and seeing Charlie as a kid with a perfect family who hasn’t experienced these kinds of difficulties was a part of that. Leigh does not at any point lead the reader, or the characters, to believe that Leo and Charlie’s experiences are similar. Instead she uses this to help make Charlie relatable to Leo. The reveal of what was going on with Leo was not as smooth as it could have been. It was built up to be a big reveal, but it…wasn’t? It’s a nitpick really. The tension of that thread wasn’t as tight as it could have been. Leo’s relationship with all of the kids — his sister, and then Charlie’s siblings — was something I very much enjoyed. Leigh created different moments where people Leo might relate to more than adults were able to meet some of his needs. In this way, we began to see a network being woven around him. Leigh did a great job of establishing the beginnings of trust between them. Plus Leo’s love for and care for his sister was just heartbreaking and beautiful. The subject matter is difficult but I think it definitely does a good job staying within YA bounds. I would recommend this book.

thread.title: Ayodhya settlement draft to be ready by Dec 6: UP Shia Central Waqf Board
thread.title_full: Ayodhya settlement draft to be ready by Dec 6: UP Shia Central Waqf Board

posts.author: Press Trust of India
posts.title: Ayodhya settlement draft to be ready by Dec 6: UP Shia Central Waqf Board
posts.text:
Ayodhya settlement draft to be ready by Dec 6: UP Shia Central Waqf Board Press Trust of India, Lucknow, Nov 7 2017, 14:12 IST Shia Central Waqf Board chairman Wasim Rizvi meeting with Sri Sri Ravi Shankar over the Ram Temple issue. Twitter photo.
The Uttar Pradesh Shia Central Waqf Board today said it would prepare a draft proposal for a peaceful settlement of the Ayodhya dispute by December 6, the day the Babri Mosque was demolished in 1992.
Board Chairman Wasim Rizvi, who has made public his opinion that a Ram temple should be built at the site, said he would visit Ayodhya this month to meet seers and mahants.
"I have already discussed terms and conditions with many of them and some petitioners for the draft proposal for agreement to settle the dispute mutually," Rizvi told PTI.
"By December 6, I hope we will be able to prepare our draft proposal for a mutual agreement," he said.
Rizvi last month met Art of Living founder Sri Sri Ravi Shankar in Bangalore and apprised him of the Board's stand on a Ram temple at the site.
The Board does not want a mosque constructed at the site. Instead, it should be constructed elsewhere in a Muslim-populated area, he has said.
In 2010, the Allahabad High Court ruled a three-way division of the disputed 2.77-acre area between the Sunni Waqf Board, Nirmohi Akhara and Lord Ram Lalla.
Rizvi, however, was of the view that partition of the disputed land in Ayodhya would not be a "practical idea" and would not be "peaceful and long lasting".
He did not divulge the contents of the draft he was preparing but said he would convene a meeting of the Waqf Board to get consent of the members before moving ahead on it and making it public.
The Shia Central Waqf Board has impleaded itself as a party in the Ayodhya case by submitting a 30-page affidavit to the Supreme Court on August 8 this year. It has staked claim to the Babri mosque, maintaining that it was a Shia mosque.
Rizvi, who claims to be authorised by the Board to move ahead on the issue, said the number of mosques in Ayodhya was sufficient for the Muslims residing there and there was no need for a new mosque.
He said that those demanding construction of a mosque at Lord Ram's birthplace, or near it, only wanted to prolong the dispute.
"The demolished mosque belonged to the Shia Waqf and the All India Muslim Personal Law Board (AIMPLB) has no right to decide on it. Only the Shia board has the right to decide," Rizvi has said earlier.
About his meeting with Sri Sri Ravi Shankar, he said he had conveyed his intentions to him, adding that the initiative for the out-of-court settlement would strengthen Hindu-Muslim brotherhood.
In a bid to resolve Ayodhya issue, Ravi Shankar reportedly met Nirmohi Akhara leaders and Muslim law board members recently.
Though the AIMPLB is not a party in the case, it wields considerable influence as the apex Islamic body on religious and personal matters.
AIMPLB member and Convenor of Babri Masjid Action Committee (BMAC) Zafaryab Jilani has denied that any of its authorised representatives met the Art of Living founder for an out-of-court settlement.
"The Ayodhya dispute cannot be settled through arbitration. We will never withdraw our claim to the land in Ayodhya where once the Babri mosque stood and was demolished on December 6, 1992," Jilani has said.

thread.title_full: Meek Mill bags 2-4 years in prison for violating probation

posts.author: Admin2 SundiataPost
posts.title: Meek Mill bags 2-4 years in prison for violating probation
posts.text:
Meek Mill bags 2-4 years in prison for violating probation November 7, 2017 
American hip hop recording artist, Meek Mill was sentenced to two to four years in prison on Monday after violating his probation, according to CBS 3. 
The rapper, 30, who was already under probation for a drug and weapons case, was arrested twice this year. 
Earlier in March, he was arrested in St. Louis and charged with misdemeanor assault for an altercation with two airport employees. 
Also, in August, the rapper, whose real name is Robert Rihmeek William, was charged with reckless endangerment for illegally riding his dirt bike in Inwood. 
He took a plea deal and the case will be dismissed after six months of good behaviour and 30 hours of community service. 
In a statement, JAY-Z, who runs Roc Nation, the management company that Mill is signed with, called the sentence “unjust and heavy handed.” 
“We will always stand by and support Meek Mill, both as he attempts to right this wrongful sentence and then in returning to his musical career.”

thread.title: Patlamanın olduğu okulda Validen inceleme
thread.title_full: Patlamanın olduğu okulda Validen inceleme

posts.title: Patlamanın olduğu okulda Validen inceleme
posts.text:
Yorum Yap Yazdır Facebook 'ta Paylaş Patlamanın olduğu okulda Validen inceleme Zonguldak’ın Çaycuma ilçesinde işitme engelli personelin yaşamını yitirdiği aralarında öğrencilerin de bulunduğu 7 kişinin yaralandığı kazan faciasında Vali Ahmet Çınar incelemelerde bulundu.  09 
Zonguldak’ın Çaycuma ilçesinde işitme engelli personelin yaşamını yitirdiği aralarında öğrencilerin de bulunduğu 7 kişinin yaralandığı kazan faciasında Vali Ahmet Çınar incelemelerde bulundu. 
Çaycuma Mesleki Teknik ve Endüstri Meslek Lisesi’nin kalorifer kazanının bulunduğu tek katlı binada patlama meydana geldi. Sabah saatlerinde yaşanan olayda Selahattin Köse isimli işitme engelli hizmetli yaşamını yitirdi. 
Olayda Lise Müdürü Ali Gücük, okulun müdür yardımcısı Durmuş Uçar, kalorifer dairesi görevlisi Süleyman Uçar ile öğrencilerden Gürkan Taşçı, Serhat İlgen, Ümit Yağcı ve Ergün Uzun yaralandı. Ambulanslarla kaldırıldıkları hastanede tedavileri tamamlanan yaralıların sağlık durumlarının iyi olduğu belirtildi. 
Öte yandan Zonguldak Valisi Ahmet Çınar, beraberindeki heyetle birlikte okul bahçesinde incelemelerde bulundu. İnceleme sonrası gazetecilere açıklamalarda bulunan Vali Ahmet Çınar, yaşanan kazaya ilişkin soruşturmanın sürdüğünü ifade etti. 
Olayın akabinde doğalgaz sistemine geçmek için çalışmalara başlandığını ifade eden Çınar, şöyle dedi: 
“Yaşanan kaza olay teknik sistemden kaynaklı bir olay mı yada insan hatasından mı kaynaklı bunun araştırmasını, itfaiye, biz ve teknik ekipler inceliyorlar. Konu aynı zamanda adli olay, savcılığımız bu konuyu takip ediyor. Bizler de idari yönden takibini yapıyoruz. Rapordan sonra hatanın nereden kaynaklandığı belli olacak. Sistemden mi yoksa kişiden mi kaynaklandığını da söylemek gerekir. Sistem yeni bir sistem. Halihazırda 2-3 yıllık bir sistem. Dolayısıyla yaşanan elbette üzücü. Takibi yapılıyor, gereği yasal anlamda yapacağız. Bir işitme engelli işçimiz vefat etti. Okul müdürümüz, bir yardımcımız, bir öğretmen, dört öğrencimiz hafif şekilde yaralandılar. Kontrolleri yapıldı, hastanede hiç kimse yok. Herkesin sağlık durumu gayet iyi. Ama bir işçimiz söylediğim gibi vefat etti. Hemen bu patlamanın akabinde bu görüntülerde eğitimin doğru olmayacağını düşündük. Bugün yıkılmış olan enkaz kısmını hemen kaldıracağız. Okulun da doğal gaz sistemine geçişi için işlemleri başlattık. En hızlı şekilde bunu yapacağız. Ve öğrencilerimizin eğitiminde bir sorun olmayacak. Eğitim devam edecek. Onun tedbirini alıyoruz.” Okulda eğitime bir gün ara verildi. Savcılıkça başlatılan soruşturma devam ediyor. Okulun bahçesindeki kalorifer kazanının bulunduğu binanın yanındaki tek katlı kantin binasında da maddi hasar meydana geldi.

thread.title: De boerderijdeken
thread.title_full: De boerderijdeken

posts.author: Haakmuts
posts.text:
Je deken gaat echt heel mooi worden,de Caron Simply Soft is ook erg mooi om mee te werken. De manier zoals je de squares aan elkaar hebt gezet is echt prachtig. Ik moet eens gaan uit vogelen hoe je dat hebt gedaan want ik moet mijn restjes deken ook aan elkaar maken en dit lijkt me een mooie manier.
En ach mannen snappen niks van wol,[ik ook niet van voetbal] ook al ligt je zolder vol dan kan het zijn dat je toch net niet het juiste kleurtje of wolletje hebt. Ik heb ook al vaak de gezegde, ik rook niet, ik ga niet naar de sportschool, ik ga niet naar de schoonheidsspecialiste, ik drink niet, elke hobby kost geld en al dit soort kreten. Gelukkig kan hij er meestal wel om lachen want hij weet dat het juiste wolletje er toch gewoon moet komen want anders kun je niet verder ondanks de enorme voorraad die op zolder of waar dan ook ligt. Succes met je deken.
Groetjes van Claire

thread.title: Hamilton named in major tax scandal
thread.title_full: Hamilton named in major tax scandal

posts.author: Melanie
posts.title: Hamilton named in major tax scandal
posts.text:
Home / F1 News / Hamilton named in major tax scandal F1 News Hamilton named in major tax scandal November 7, 2017 Formula One - Mercedes-AMG Petronas Motorsport, Austrian GP 2017. Lewis Hamilton 
Nov.7 - World champion Lewis Hamilton has found himself at the centre of an international tax avoidance scandal. 
A trove of documents known as the 'Paradise Papers' reveals that the Mercedes driver as well as wealthy peers including Bono, Apple, Nike and even the Queen avoid tax through a series of secret offshore deals. 
The Hamilton accusation centres around his private jet, in which Hamilton actually received a more than $4 million tax refund by importing it into the Isle of Man and claiming it was mainly used for business. 
"We are talking about tens of billions that are effectively being leached from our vital public services by a super-rich elite that holds the taxation system and the rest of us in contempt," said British politician Jeremy Corbyn. 
A lawyer representing Hamilton insists the tax arrangement is legal.

posts.title: Şamiloğlu ve Şamilkan Sporcularından 15 derece
posts.text: Bu haber 07 Kasım 2017, Salı 09:24 tarihinde eklendi. 76 kez okundu. Şamiloğlu ve Şamilkan Sporcularından 15 derece Şamiloğlu ve Şamilkan Spor Kulübü sporcuları Sakarya ilinde gerçekleştirilen 2017-2018 İllerarası Karate Ligi ikinci ayağında; 6 birincilik, 3 ikincilik ve 6 üçüncülük elde ederek büyük bir başarıya daha imza attı. Sakarya ilinde düzenlenen müsabakalara 11 ilden 48 kulüp olmak üzere toplam 1125 sporcu katıldı. Şamiloğlu Spor Kulübü ve Şamilkan Spor Kulübü Antrenörleri Şemsi Şamiloğlu ve Hayriddin Alkan, dereceye giren giremeyen tüm sporcularını kutlayıp başarılarının devamını dilediler. Karate liginin 2. ayağında dereceye giren sporcular ise şöyle; Sude Tüysüz, Eylül Avşar, Mehmet Tunca Can, Ersel Kocadoğan, Abdul Samet Köşe ve Yetkin Beşbunar 1., Onur Gürbüz, Ahmet Efe Külhan, Yaren Güler 2., Abdullah Mete Özkul, Serra Nur Çevikdal, Sanem Yörük, Kerem Balmumcu, Simge Su Bingül, Erdal Efe İşler 3. oldu. 12:12 (мск) , источник: Деловое сообщество Житель Таганрога заплатит полмиллиона за торговлю пиратскими дисками 
В Таганроге мировой судья судебного участка № 10 осудил 32-летнего жителя за незаконное использование объектов авторского права или смежных прав. Об сообщает пресс-служба Южной транспортной прокуратуры. 
Как отметили в надзорном ведомстве, в период с июня 2016 года по 31 января 2017 года молодой человек купил более 5,3 тысячи нелицензионных DVD и CD дисков, после чего продавал их рядом с железнодорожными станциями. 
Ущерб, который он нанес правообладателям, суд оценил в 529 тысяч руб. Для того, чтобы он смог компенсировать данную сумму, его приговорили к 332 часам общественно-полезных

posts.author: Admin2 SundiataPost
posts.title: Anambra polls: APGA alleged interception of voting materials
posts.text:
Anambra polls: APGA alleged interception of voting materials November 7, 2017 
Amawbia – Chief Victor Oye , the National Chairman of the All Progressives Grand Alliance (APGA) has claimed that two lorry loads of sensitive materials for Anambra Nov.18 governorship poll were intercepted on Monday in Awka. 
Oye made the claim during a news conference he addressed in his country home in Amawbia near Awka on Monday. 
He said that the lorries were intercepted at Okpuno Awka area in a hotel by eagle eyes security operatives. 
“The materials were all INEC sensitive materials for the conduct of Nov.18 governorship election in Anambra and the trucks were discovered in a hotel at Okpuno Awka area’’, he said. 
Oye blamed opposition political parties to be behind the act and called on the federal government to thoroughly investigate the matter to uncover the bigwigs behind the act. 
“We are suspecting that opposition parties were behind this dangerous act and we call for adequate and thorough investigation of the matter by the Federal Government’’, he said. 
The APGA national chairman said that the party would not tolerate any form of sharp practices in the forthcoming election, and will resist any attempt by any group to rig the election. 
He said the news conference was to draw the attention of Nigerians and the world on the negative development ahead of Anambra governorship election. 
Oye said that APGA believed in the capability of INEC and the President Muhammadu Buhari-led government to conduct a free, fair and credible election in the state. 
“We are saddened by these developments, and we call on the federal government to do something immediate to reassure the people of the state of its neutrality in Nov.18 poll’’, he said. 
When contacted, the Anambra State police command denied knowledge of the interception of any sensitive electoral material in Awka. 
The Anambra State Commissioner of Police, Mr Garba Umar Garba told NAN that no such materials were intercepted anywhere in the state. 
“I am yet to be informed of any such seizure anywhere in Anambra and I feel the claim is untrue’’, he said. 
Dr Nkwachukwu Orji, the INEC Resident Electoral Commissioner in Anambra also told NAN that the commission was not aware of any such development. 
“The INEC in Anambra is surprised to hear this kind of report and will say officially that we are not aware of any such seizure’’, Orji said.

thread.title_full: Na Ostravsku bylo ukončeno protipovodňové cvičení

posts.title: Na Ostravsku bylo ukončeno protipovodňové cvičení
posts.text:
Velikost textu: Na Ostravsku bylo ukončeno protipovodňové cvičení 
Téměř dvě stovky cvičících z šesti evropských zemí a organizátorů čtyřdenního mezinárodního protipovodňového cvičení CZECH MODEX 2017 se v neděli 5.11.2017 rozloučily na výcvikové základně IZS v Ostravě-Hranečníku a odjelo domů . Účastníci cvičení 5.listopad 2017 - 12:00 Zástupci Evropské unie a Evropské komise předávali týmům certifikáty o úspěšném zvládnutí náročného cvičení, které v Moravskoslezském kraji organizoval Hasičský záchranný sbor Moravskoslezského kraje a Záchranný útvar HZS ČR Hlučín ve spolupráci s Povodím Odry.Do cvičení se zapojily hasičské a záchranné humanitární týmy a další odborníci ze šesti evropských zemí - Polska, Rumunska, Itálie, Nizozemska, Litvy a Lotyšska.Cvičení CZECH MODEX 2017 se zúčastnily celkem tři moduly vysokokapacitního čerpání z Polska, Rumunska a Itálie, dále speciální jednotka zaměřená na detekci nebezpečných látek v prostředí z Nizozemí, koordinační tým Evropské unie společně s technickým týmem podpory činnosti tvořený experty z Litvy a Lotyšska.„Cílem cvičení MODEX v MSK bylo procvičit kvalitu a efektivitu nasazení záchranářských modulů u povodní v rámci Mechanismu Civilní ochrany EU, přičemž v návaznosti na certifikaci těchto modulů se jednalo zejména o vysokokapacitní čerpání vody a dále o odběr a analýzy vzorků v souvislosti se životním prostředím. V neposlední řadě cvičení mělo také prokázat připravenost hostitelské země (tedy České republiky) na příjem takovéto zahraniční pomoci. Na základě zkušeností z průběhu cvičení se dá konstatovat, že cvičení MODEX bezezbytku splnilo svůj účel”, řekl k vyhodnocení brigádní generál Ing. Vladimír Vlček, Ph.D., ředitel HZS Moravskoslezského kraje.Název cvičení MODEX je odvozen z anglického MOdule EXercise (cvičení modulů). V Moravskoslezském kraji se uskutečnilo jedno z celkově čtyř takových cvičení, připravovaných postupně v letech 20172018 v Polsku, ČR, Itálii a Francii. Finanční prostředky pro tento projet vyčlenila Evropská komise. O cvičení informoval Moravskoslezskénovinky.cz por. Mgr. Petr Kůdela, tiskový mluvčí HZS Moravskoslezského kraje. (jv,moravskoslezskenovinky.cz,foto:hzs msk)

thread.title: Races to Watch: Groundbreaking LGBT Candidates and Allies
thread.title_full: Races to Watch: Groundbreaking LGBT Candidates and Allies

posts.author: Trudy Ring
posts.title: Races to Watch: Groundbreaking LGBT Candidates and Allies
posts.text:
By Trudy Ring Danica Roem, Virginia House of Delegates 
Danica Roem is seeking to make history in Virginia by becoming the first out transgender person elected to the state legislature – and by defeating incumbent Bob Marshall, the body’s most outrageously anti-LGBT member. She’s running for the House of Delegates from District 13, centered on Prince William County in northern Virginia. A former journalist, she bested three rivals in the Democratic primary in June to advance to Tuesday's general election. Her priorities include improving the area’s roads and mass transit, matters she says Marshall has neglected in his 26 years in the legislature to instead focus on trying to ban same-sex marriage and restrict where transgender people go to the restroom. Marshall, a Republican, has made transphobic remarks during the campaign, at one point asking a reporter, “Why do you call Danica a woman? Did Danica’s DNA change?” And just last week he told religious right radio host Sandy Rios that transgender people are living a fantasy and defy the laws of nature. Roem has hit back strongly against Marshall, including with an ad in which she says, “There are millions of transgender people in this country and we all deserve representation in government. So when I stand up on the Statehouse floor and the speaker says ‘the gentlewoman from Manassas,’ LGBTQ kids everywhere will know they can succeed because of who they are, not despite it.” She has some high-profile endorsers, such as Victory Fund, the Human Rights Campaign, EMILY’s List, and former Vice President Joe Biden. Jenny Durkan, Seattle Mayor 
Jenny Durkan has a shot at becoming Seattle’s first out lesbian mayor ever and its first woman mayor since the 1920s. She and another woman, urban planner Cary Moon, emerged as the top two candidates in an August primary , so they’re facing each other in Tuesday’s general election; municipal elections in Seattle are nonpartisan. The incumbent, Ed Murray, decided not to run again after being accused of sexually abusing younger men, allegations that he denies. Durkan, formerly a federal prosecutor (appointed by President Obama), plans to fight for more affordable housing, assist the city’s homeless population, and seek a municipal income tax. Seattle’s fabled progressive values, she said, are “a rebuke to what Donald Trump stands for.” Polls show her likely to best Moon, but she recently noted, “The only poll I trust is the one that voters deliver.” She’s endorsed by Victory Fund, HRC, and a host of high-profile public officials from Washington State, including U.S. Sen. Patty Murray, Gov. Jay Inslee, former Gov. Chris Gregoire, and Attorney General Bob Ferguson. Cathy Woolard, Atlanta Mayor 
Atlanta could get an out lesbian mayor too – City Council President Cathy Woolard is one of eight candidates seeking to replace Kasim Reed, who’s not running again. She ranked fourth in a recent poll, favored by 9.2 percent of respondents, trailing Keisha Lance Bottoms with 25.4 percent, Mary Norwood with 23.4 percent, and Peter Aman with 12 percent. Still, anything can happen, and if no candidate wins a majority Tuesday, the top two will advance to a runoff December 5. Woolard is a Democrat, but the election is nonpartisan. On the City Council, she’s worked to improve neglected neighborhoods and transform abandoned rail lines into mixed-use recreational trails. She’s endorsed by HRC and Victory Fund, among others. There are also three LGBT candidates running for Atlanta City Council: Liliana Bakhtiari, who would be the first LGBT Muslim elected to office in the U.S.; Alex Wan , who would succeed Woolard as council president; and Kirk Rich. All have Victory Fund’s endorsement. Luis Lopez, California Assembly 
California is holding a special election this year in the state Assembly’s 51st District, as that seat was left vacant when Xavier Becerra became California attorney general, succeeding Kamala Harris after she was elected to the U.S. Senate. Luis Lopez, who is gay, and Wendy Carrillo were the top two vote recipients in a crowded primary field in October, and under the state’s top-two system, they will face each other in the general election December 5 even though both are Democrats; the district, in east Los Angeles, is heavily Democratic anyway. Lopez, endorsed by Victory Fund, is cofounder of Honor PAC, the nation’s first Latino/a LGBT political action committee, and has served on the board of Planned Parenthood-Los Angeles for seven years. He’s a longtime activist for affordable housing, parks, and transportation in L.A. Lisa Middleton, Palm Springs City Council 
Lisa Middleton, running for City Council in Palm Springs, Calif., in Tuesday's election, would make history as the first openly transgender person elected to a nonjudicial office in the state. Middleton, who is retired from the California State Compensation Insurance Fund, is a member of the Palm Springs Planning Commission and chairwoman of the Organized Neighborhoods of Palm Springs, and a member of the boards of directors of the Desert Horticulture Society and the Desert LGBTQ Center. In 2014 she was the center’s interim executive director. On the planning commission she has advocated for downtown renewal, increased use of solar energy, and cooperation between developers and neighborhoods. There are two open seats on the council, to which members are elected on a nonpartisan, citywide basis, and six candidates. One of the other candidates is cisgender bisexual woman Christy Gilbert Holstege, an attorney who focuses on assisting underserved communities in the area, including people with disabilities, LGBTQ people, homeless individuals, injured workers, personal injury victims, and victims of discrimination and violence. She and Middleton are both endorsed by Victory Fund. Andrea Jenkins and Phillipe Cunningham, Minneapolis City Council 
In what may be the year of the transgender candidate, in Tuesday's election two trans people are running for City Council in the progressive city of Minneapolis. Andrea Jenkins (right) is running in the Eighth Ward and Phillipe Cunningham (left) in the Fourth. Either would be the first openly trans candidate elected to a major metropolitan council. Jenkins, a Democrat who has been an aide to departing Council Vice President Elizabeth Glidden, is the first choice of the Minneapolis Star Tribune , which noted that she is highly qualified and will assure a smooth transition. She has opponents from the Green and Libertarian parties; city elections are officially nonpartisan, but candidates can identify themselves with a party on the ballot. Jenkins is endorsed by Victory Fund, as is Cunningham, running against City Council President and fellow Democrat Barb Johnson in the Fourth Ward, in addition to two other candidates. The Star Tribune endorsed Johnson, although it praised Cunningham’s service as a senior policy aide to Mayor Betsy Hodges, and as a special education teacher and youth advocate, making him its second choice for the position. There’s also a cisgender lesbian, Jillia Pessenda, running for City Council in Minneapolis’s First Ward. Endorsed by Victory Fund, she’s a strong advocate for food access, LGBT rights, and other progressive causes, but the Star Tribune has endorsed the ward’s incumbent council member, Kevin Reich. Sophia Hawes-Tingey, Midvale, Utah, Mayor 
Sophia Hawes-Tingey stands to be another history-maker this year, as she hopes to become the first transgender elected official in Utah. She’s running for mayor of Midvale, a town of about 30,000 that is a suburb of Salt Lake City. She placed second to incumbent Robert Hale in a five-way nonpartisan primary in August, so the two will face off Tuesday. Hawes-Tingey is a Navy veteran, software engineer, and longtime community activist. She has been vice chair of the Community Council of Midvale and a member of the Women’s State Legislative Council. She vows to work for LGBT equality in addition to other social justice causes, such as addressing homelessness and human trafficking, and to work for economic development that will benefit all Midvale residents. She’s endorsed by Victory Fund. Ralph Northam, Virginia Governor 
One of the most closely watched races in the nation is the contest for Virginia governor, and while both major-party candidates are straight, it's definitely of interest to LGBT people.. Democrat Ralph Northam, a former physician and current lieutenant governor, is seeking to succeed his boss, Gov. Terry McAuliffe, who’s leaving office. Northam, endorsed by HRC, is a strong LGBT rights supporter and holds generally progressive positions; his website promises, “Ralph will be a brick wall against the discrimination of the Trump Administration.” He’s gotten some criticism lately, though, for saying he’d sign a bill to ban sanctuary cities in Virginia. He’s still far more progressive than Republican candidate Ed Gillespie, who’s been trying to portray himself as a moderate but actually has a strong anti-LGBT record, having opposed same-sex marriage and advocated restricting trans people’s restroom access. He’s a former chair of the Republican National Committee and helped craft Newt Gingrich’s far-right “Contract With America” in the 1990s. An averaging of recent polls shows Northam with a lead of 46 percent to 43 percent over Gillespie going into Tuesday’s election, according to FiveThirtyEight.com . HRC has also endorsed the Democratic candidates for Virginia lieutenant governor, Justin Fairfax, and attorney general, Mark Herring. Phil Murphy, New Jersey Governor 
Another gubernatorial election happening this year is in New Jersey, where Republican Chris Christie is exiting office (bye!) and Democrat Phil Murphy is running against GOPer Kim Guadagno. With Christie’s approval ratings in the basement, New Jersey voters appear to want to replace him with a Democrat; Murphy has a big lead in the polls going into Tuesday. Murphy, a former Goldman Sachs executive, is a staunch supporter of LGBT rights and other progressive causes. He’s endorsed by HRC, and political and showbiz luminaries have campaigned for him, including Barack Obama, Bill Clinton, Joe Biden, and Jon Bon Jovi. Doug Jones, U.S. Senator From Alabama 
Last but by no means least in a special election taking place December 12 for U.S. senator from Alabama. Anti-LGBT and general religious right extremist Roy Moore is seeking to fill the position vacated by Jeff Sessions when he became U.S. attorney general; Moore bested the interim senator, Luther Strange, in the Republican primary and a subsequent runoff. Moore was removed from the Alabama Supreme Court, where he was chief justice, for ethics violations related to his efforts to block marriage equality in Alabama; he contended that state officials didn’t have to obey the U.S. Supreme Court’s 2015 marriage equality ruling, which was not the case. He has a long history of demonizing LGBT people, having said that transgender people are mentally ill, that homosexual “acts” should be illegal, and that marriage equality would doom civilization. He’s also deeply opposed to abortion, wants to cut taxes sharply, and hates anything resembling “socialized” medicine. While Alabamians haven’t elected a Democrat to the Senate in more than 20 years, there’s a chance that Moore will prove too extreme for them, as he and the Democratic candidate, Doug Jones, are neck-and-neck in the polls. Jones is a former federal prosecutor best known for obtaining the convictions of two of the racists who bombed a church in Birmingham in 1963, killing four young African-American girls, and had evaded justice for nearly 40 years. Jones is in favor of expanding health care and environmental protections, a living wage, and civil rights for all. His website doesn’t mention LGBT rights specifically, but he has made supportive comments in the past. He has the endorsement of the Human Rights Campaign. 
There may be an election happening in your area this year that isn't covered here. Victory Fund, which backs qualified openly LGBT candidates, has a long list of endorsees on its website, encompassing candidates from Newton, Mass., to Anchorage, Alaska. Find out about them here. related slideshows

प्रादेशिक » मध्यप्रदेश को मिला विशेष राष्ट्रीय पुरस्कार मध्यप्रदेश को मिला विशेष राष्ट्रीय पुरस्कार 
  
हैदराबाद में प्रदेश का ऑटोमेटेड पब्लिक बाइक शेयरिंग और हब एंड स्पोक मॉडल पुरस्‍कृत 
भोपाल   मध्यप्रदेश को शहरी परिवहन में सर्वोत्तम अभ्यास परियोजना पब्किल बाइक शेयरिंग सिस्टम तथा क्लस्टर बेस्ड हब एंड स्पोक अर्बन ट्रांसपोर्ट मॉडल के विशेष राष्ट्रीय पुरस्कार से सम्मानित किया गया है। पीबीएस साइकिल की खासियत पब्लिक बाइक शेयरिंग की साइकिलों को लॉक और अनलॉक करने के लिए मोबाइल एप्लीकेशन और एप का इस्तेमाल किया जाता है। रजिस्टर्ड होने के बाद ओटीपी जनरेट होता है, जिसे साइकिल पर लगे कम्प्यूटर बोर्ड पर टाइप कर इसे अनलॉक किया जा सकता है। मोबाइल एप्लीकेशन से साइकिलों की रियल टाइम उपलब्धता और करीबी साइकिल स्टेशन की जानकारी प्राप्त की जा सकती है। राइड को स्मूथ बनाने के लिए साइकिल में पंचर रेसिसटेंट टायर के साथ ही हेडलाइट और एल्युमिनियम बास्केट एवं गियर दिए गये हैं। पीबीएस योजना में अभी तक करीब 32 हजार किलोमीटर साइकिल चलाई जा चुकी है और करीब 150 लोग नियमित माय बाइक की सवारी करते हैं। पीबीएस के तहत चार महीने में 25 हजार से अधिक रजिस्ट्रेशन हुए हैं। 
तेलंगाना के आई.टी. एवं नगरीय विकास मंत्री केटी रामाराव ने मध्यप्रदेश की नगरीय विकास एवं आवास मंत्री माया सिंह को हैदराबाद में दसवें अर्बन मोबिलिटी इंडिया कॉन्फ्रेंस में ये विशेष राष्ट्रीय पुरस्कार प्रदान किये। इस अवसर पर केन्द्रीय आवास एवं शहरी कार्य सचिव दुर्गाशंकर मिश्रा, मध्यप्रदेश के नगरीय प्रशासन एवं विकास आयुक्त विवेक अग्रवाल और भोपाल स्मार्ट सिटी डेवलपमेंट कॉर्पोरेशन लिमिटेड की कार्यपालक निदेशक प्रियंका दास उपस्थित थे। 
उल्लेखनीय है कि भोपाल स्मार्ट सिटी डेवलपमेंट कॉर्पोरेशन लिमिटेड ने 25 जून 2017 को भोपाल में पब्लिक बाइक शेयरिंग योजना की शुरूआत की थी। योजना में शहर के अलग-अलग स्थानों पर 50 स्टेशन बनाए गए हैं जिनमें 500 साइकिलें हैं। भोपाल स्मार्ट बाइक शेयरिंग देश का पहला ऑटोमेटेड सिस्टम है जो पूरी तरह कैशलेस है। इसके स्टेशन मानव-रहित हैं, इन्हें केन्द्रीय नियंत्रण-कक्ष से जोड़ा गया है। स्टेशनों पर साइकिलें सात दिन 24 घंटे उपलब्ध रहती हैं। योजना को बीआरटीएस से जोड़ा गया है। 
बीआरटी कॉरीडोर के बस स्टॉप के पास साइकिल स्टेशन बनाए गए हैं, जिससे लोक परिवहन को बढ़ावा मिल सके। पीबीएस योजना के तहत साइकिल चलाने के लिए रजिस्ट्रेशन फीस 500 रुपये निर्धारित है, जो रजिस्ट्रेशन रद्द कराने पर वापस हो जाती है। इसमें एक महीने, तीन महीने और एक साल की मेम्बरशिप का प्रावधान है। एक माह की मेम्बरशिप के लिए 149 रुपये, तीन महीने की 299 और एक साल के लिए 999 रुपये मेम्बरशिप फीस रखी गई है। मेम्बर के लिए प्रत्येक आधे घंटे की साइकिल राइड फ्री है। नॉन मेम्बर के लिए आधे घंटे की साइकिल चलाने का शुल्क 10 रुपये है। 
अर्बन ट्रांसपोर्ट मॉडल 
अमृत योजना के तहत लोक परिवहन की बस सेवा के लिए क्लस्टर आधारित हब और स्पोक मॉडल बनाया गया है। इसके तहत शहरों में क्लस्टर बनाकर बस सेवा शुरू की गई है। बसों का संचालन वायबिलिटी गैप फंडिंग (वीजीएफ) के तहत किया जा रहा है। वीजीएफ 40 प्रतिशत तय किया गया है। इससे बसों की संख्या और कनेक्टिविटी बढ़ी है। अलग-अलग शहरों में एसपीवी बनाकर बस सेवा शुरू की गई है और बड़े शहरों के आसपास के छोटे शहरों को भी सेवा से जोड़ा गया है। इससे लोक परिवहन व्यवस्थित हो गया है और अंतिम छोर तक बस सेवा शुरू होने से लोगों को राहत मिली है। 
डेली

thread.title: Başbakan Binali Yıldırım'dan Paradise Paper belgeleri hakkında açıklama Son Dakika Türk Haberleri
thread.title_full: Başbakan Binali Yıldırım'dan Paradise Paper belgeleri hakkında açıklama Son Dakika Türk Haberleri

posts.author: Son Dakika T Rk
posts.title: Başbakan Binali Yıldırım'dan Paradise Paper belgeleri hakkında açıklama Son Dakika Türk Haberleri
posts.text:
Kim Milyoner Olmak İster'de Köy... Başbakan Binali Yıldırım'dan Paradise Paper belgeleri hakkında açıklama Başbakan Binali Yıldırım, Mike Pence ile yapacağı görüşme öncesi Ankara Esenboğa Havalimanı'nda açıklama yapıyor. Yıldırım'a görüşmeleri sırasında Enerji ve Tabii Kaynaklar Bakanı Berat Albayrak ve Dışişleri Bakanı Mevlüt Çavuşoğlu da eşlik edecek. 07 Kasım 2017 Salı 10:55 Bu haber kez okundu. 
Binali Yıldırım, görüşmelerde Türkiye-ABD arasındaki ikili ilişkilerin ve bölgesel konuların ele alınacağını bildirdi. Yıldırım, ABD ile Suriye ve Irak meseleleri, FETÖ ile ilgili talepler iletilecek, PYD-YPG ve DEAŞ'la mücadele konularında da görüşmeler yapılacak. 
Yıldırım, ziyaret sırasında ABD ile yaşanan vize kriziyle ilgili de görüşüleceğini açıkladı. Yıldırım, vize kriziyle ilgili yaşanan son gelişmeleri, 'Sınırlı da olsa başlaması olumlu' şeklinde niteledi. Yıldırım, görüşmelerin her iki ülkenin beklentileri açısından verimli geçmesini de umduğunu dile getirdi. 
Öte yandan dün ABD'nin Türkiye Büyükelçiliği, vize yasağı konusunda yumuşamaya ilişkin yaptığı açıklamada Türk hükümetinin ABD çalışanlarını tutuklamayacağına ilişkin güvence verdiğini açıklamıştı. Bugün Esenboğa'da yaptığı açıklamada Binali Yıldırım'a bu soru soruldu. Yıldırım, 'İki ülke de hukuk devletidir. Bizim onlara güvence vermemiz veya onların bize güvence vermesi söz konusu olamaz. 15 Temmuz darbesinin arkasında Fetullah Gülen'in olduğuyla ilgili net düşüncelerimiz var. O yüzden iadesini talep ediyor ve yine olayla bağlantısı olan kişilerle ilgili benzer taleplerimiz oluyor. Ancak bunlarla ilgili bir güvence istemek söz konusu değil' dedi. 
Paradise Paper belgeleriyle ilgili iddialar 
Başbakan Binali Yıldırım'ın Paradise Paper belgelerinde adı geçen iki oğluyla ilgili soru üzerine Yıldırım, 'Ben hayatım boyunca denizcilikle uğraştım. Siyasete başlayınca da işlerimi evlatlarıma bıraktım. Evlatlarımın en küçüğü 33 en büyüğü 40 yaşında. Dolayısıyla onlar kendi işlerini yapıyor ve memlekete hizmet etmeye çalışıyor. Siyasete başlarken benim çocuklarıma tavsiyem oldu. Devletle kesinlikle iş yapmayacaksınız, devletin bankalarından hiçbir kaynak kullanmayacaksınız dedim. Denizcilik küreseldir, dünyanın her tarafında iş yapıyorlar. Bunun gizli saklı bir tarafı yok." dedi. 
Soruşturma açılmasını talep ediyorum 
Binali Yıldırım, 'Bu şirketler açık faaliyet gösteren şirketlerdir. Bunu heryerden araştırabilirsiniz. Bu iddialar ilk kez ortaya atılmadı. İlk kez 2008 yılında çıktı. Hepsini açıkladım. tekrar 2017 Mayıs'ta gündeme geldi. Yine açıkladım. Beni akılları sıra yıpratmaya çalışıyorlar. Milletim beni bilir. Benim dokunulmazlığım var ama oğullarımın yok her türlü araştırma ve inceleme yapılabilir. Haksız yere itham edilmeleri kabul edilemez. Biz onurumuzla varız, ülkemiz ve milletimiz için bütün ömrümüzü verdik. Bizim için en büyük servet itibarımızdır. Gerisi gelip geçicidir. Ancak itibar insanı öbür dünyaya kadar taşıyacak elde edilmesi zor bir meziyettir. Bakın vergi verilmiyor diye itham ediyorlar.' Yükleniyor...
